item.title: Discord-RPC
item.description: An Python wrapper for Discord RPC

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hey, I’m Senophyx, an Indonesia-based coder with a passion for cool projects. Python is my go-to, but I’m also comfy with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS and other programming language. You might’ve seen my Discord-RPC project, which got some attention from the Discord community. Also, I founded EterNomm, a small organization focused on open-source projects.

I also have many experience as a sysadmin at various organizations and institutions, managing servers, databases, and users. I’m into gaming, music, design, photography, and all things geeky.
